union_zero_is_closed:
/-- The `character_space ğ•œ A` along with `0` is always a closed set in `weak_dual ğ•œ A`. -/
theorem union_zero_is_closed [T2Space ğ•œ] [ContinuousMul ğ•œ] : IsClosed (character_space ğ•œ A âˆª {0}) :=
  by
  simp only [union_zero, Set.setOf_forall]
  exact
    isClosed_interáµ¢ fun x =>
      isClosed_interáµ¢ fun y => isClosed_eq (eval_continuous _) <| (eval_continuous _).mul (eval_continuous _)
#align union_zero_is_closed union_zero_is_closed
union_zero:
theorem union_zero : character_space ğ•œ A âˆª {0} = { Ï† : WeakDual ğ•œ A | âˆ€ x y : A, Ï† (x * y) = Ï† x * Ï† y } :=
  le_antisymm
    (by
      rintro Ï† (hÏ† | hâ‚€)
      Â· exact hÏ†.2
      Â· exact fun x y => by simp [Set.eq_of_mem_singleton hâ‚€])
    fun Ï† hÏ† => or.elim (em <| Ï† = 0) (fun hâ‚€ => or.inr hâ‚€) fun hâ‚€ => or.inl âŸ¨hâ‚€, hÏ†âŸ©
#align union_zero union_zero
ext_ker:
theorem ext_ker {Ï† Ïˆ : character_space ğ•œ A} (h : RingHom.ker Ï† = RingHom.ker Ïˆ) : Ï† = Ïˆ :=
  by
  ext
  have : x - algebraMap ğ•œ A (Ïˆ x) âˆˆ RingHom.ker Ï† := by
    simpa only [h, RingHom.mem_ker, map_sub, alg_hom_class.commutes] using sub_self (Ïˆ x)
  Â· rwa [RingHom.mem_ker, map_sub, alg_hom_class.commutes, sub_eq_zero] at this
#align ext_ker ext_ker
ext:
@[ext]
theorem ext {Ï† Ïˆ : character_space ğ•œ A} (h : âˆ€ x, Ï† x = Ïˆ x) : Ï† = Ïˆ :=

eq_set_map_one_map_mul:
theorem eq_set_map_one_map_mul [Nontrivial ğ•œ] :
    character_space ğ•œ A = { Ï† : WeakDual ğ•œ A | Ï† 1 = 1 âˆ§ âˆ€ x y : A, Ï† (x * y) = Ï† x * Ï† y } :=
  by

  refine' âŸ¨fun h => âŸ¨map_one (âŸ¨x, hâŸ© : character_space ğ•œ A), h.2âŸ©, fun h => âŸ¨_, h.2âŸ©âŸ©
  rintro rfl

IsClosed:
#print IsClosed /-
/-- under suitable mild assumptions on `ğ•œ`, the character space is a closed set in
`weak_dual ğ•œ A`. -/
protected theorem IsClosed [Nontrivial ğ•œ] [T2Space ğ•œ] [ContinuousMul ğ•œ] : IsClosed (character_space ğ•œ A) :=
  by
  rw [eq_set_map_one_map_mul, Set.setOf_and]
  refine' IsClosed.inter (isClosed_eq (eval_continuous _) continuous_const) _
  simpa only [(union_zero ğ•œ A).symm] using union_zero_is_closed _ _
#align is_closed IsClosed
-/
